vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32000, previously approved on September 22, 2021, authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2021-22 for the maintenance and operation of various departments, activities, and amending the capital budget; and authorize the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Not to exceed $4,345,607,637 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,560,076,196), Enterprise, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,476,881,876), Capital Funds ($911,461,085), and Grants, Trusts and Other Funds ($397,188,480)
vote.description: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32000, previously approved on September 22, 2021, authorizing certain transfers and appropriation adjustments for FY 2021-22 for the maintenance and operation of various departments, activities, and amending the capital budget; and authorize the City Manager to implement those adjustments - Not to exceed $4,345,607,637 - Financing:  General Fund ($1,560,076,196), Enterprise, Internal Service, and Other Funds ($1,476,881,876), Capital Funds ($911,461,085), and Grants, Trusts and Other Funds ($397,188,480)
